name: Trollkin Raider
description: The Trollkin Raider is a robust humanoid with thick hide and a combat-ready demeanor. It possesses natural regenerative abilities and is equipped with hide armor.
memorable: The ability to regenerate hit points makes the Trollkin Raider challenging to defeat in combat, especially if not targeted with fire or acid damage.
goals: Typically, Trollkin Raiders aim to engage in combat, survive by any means necessary, and may raid or scavenge for resources.
relations: Trollkin Raiders may be allied with other Trollkin or similar humanoids, often found in groups or clans.
environment: Often encountered in hilly or forested areas where they can utilize their survival skills.
strengths: Natural regeneration allows it to recover from injuries, and thick hide provides additional armor class.
weaknesses: Low intelligence may hinder strategic planning or complex maneuvers in battle.
attacks: The Raider can attack with bites and claws, or use a spear for both melee and ranged strikes, making it versatile in close-quarters or distance combat.
most_powerful_ability: Regeneration, allowing it to regain hit points each turn unless hit by fire or acid damage.
senses: Has darkvision, allowing it to see in darkness up to 60 feet and a passive perception score of 13, aiding in awareness of surroundings.
skills: Proficient in insight, perception, nature, and survival, allowing it to track and navigate effectively.
additional_information: Can make two spear attacks or a combination of bite and claw attacks in one turn.
Utilizes its regeneration ability strategically to outlast opponents.
Thick hide contributes to a solid defense, making it durable in battle.
